name: 模糊理論在技職教育之應用研究
description: Fuzzy set theory is a research approach that can deal with problems relating to ambiguous, subjective and imprecise judgments, and it can quantify the linguistic facet of available data and preferences for individual or group decision-making. During the past decades, the fuzzy set theory has already been widely adopted by social science researchers. In the course, the fundamental concepts of fuzzy set theories, fusions of fuzzy set theories with other research methods including but not limited to the analytic hierarchical process (AHP), analytic network process (ANP), decision making trial and evaluation laboratory (DEMATEL), Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS) , VlseKriterijumska Optimizacija I Kompromisno Resenje (VIKOR), Multiple Criteria Decision Making (MCDM), Multiple Objective Decision Making (MODM), Inference System, Neural Networks and the state of the arts will be introduced. Furhter, applications of the fuzzy theories on vocational education will also be introduced.
goals: 協助學生瞭解並應用模糊理論
培養學生專業理論知識與實務之整合與創新能力。
培養學生專業批判與獨立解決問題之能力
syllabus:
Fuzzy set theory is a research approach that can deal with problems relating to ambiguous, subjective and imprecise judgments, and it can quantify the linguistic facet of available data and preferences for individual or group decision-making. During the past decades, the fuzzy set theory has already been widely adopted by social science researchers. In the course, the fundamental concepts of fuzzy set theories, fusions of fuzzy set theories with other research methods including but not limited to the analytic hierarchical process (AHP), analytic network process (ANP), decision making trial and evaluation laboratory (DEMATEL), Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS) , VlseKriterijumska Optimizacija I Kompromisno Resenje (VIKOR), Multiple Criteria Decision Making (MCDM), Multiple Objective Decision Making (MODM), Inference System, Neural Networks and the state of the arts will be introduced. Furhter, applications of the fuzzy theories on vocational education will also be introduced. The topics include 

1.  Analytic Hierarchical Process (AHP)
2.  Fuzzy AHP
3.  Analytic Network Process (ANP)
4.  Fuzzy ANP
5.  Decision Making Trial And Evaluation Laboratory (DEMATEL)
6.  Fuzzy DEMATEL 
7.  Technique For Order Of Preference By Similarity To Ideal Solution (TOPSIS)  
8.  Vlsekriterijumska Optimizacija I Kompromisno Resenje (VIKOR)
9.  Fuzzy VIKOR
10.  Rough Set Theory
11.  Fuzzy Rough Set Theory
12.  Multiple Criteria Decision Making (MCDM)
13.  Fuzzy MCDM
14.  Multiple Objective Decision Making (MODM)
15.  Fuzzy MODM
16.  Inference Systems
17.  Fuzzy Inference Systems
18.  Neural Networks
19.  Adaptive Neuro-Fuzzy Inference System
20.  Final Project Presentation

methodologies.note: 介紹模糊理論之最新進展與研究方法之結合
討論模糊理論於技職教育之應用
修課同學需要導入模糊理論，解決技職教育之問題
每位同學必須獨力完成專題研究
